author: fhilip.k
title: Japanese Voter Survey - AIM
description: Japan-specific information about how voters interact with Catalyst is not well understood, focus is needed to ensure engagement of voters.
solution: Create an incentivized survey in Japanese to obtain information about voters & allow this info to support future Catalyst improvements.
experience: AIM members are the team behind the Community Tool Kit partnering with Yuta (Japanese Community) for translation and distribution.
